categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Akshay Kumar (not to be confused with his Bollywood namesake) is a British actor who plays Rumitar Shay (credited as Mega-Destroyer First Order Monitor) in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. He is best known for playing hotel barman Adil Joshi in the British period drama The Halcyon and medical student Aayan Ibrahim on the fourth season of the spy television series Homeland.
